markdownRemark.html:
You don't need to redo the entire draw. You can edit the email of this participant. Just follow these steps: enter the draw group within the app > tap on the participant to be edited > tap on "edit participant" > resend. This way, the participant will receive the email that didn't reach them. This process does not alter the overall draw.

Did we help you? If you continue to have problems, just get in touch. We are always available!

Happy Secret Santa!

frontmatter.title: HOW TO EDIT THE EMAIL OF A PARTICIPANT
